Dedicated to all combatants of WWII: Lest we forget - we are all first and foremost humans.

Lest we forget: Victory Day

  • By Artem V. Shamsutdinov
  • May 9th, 2025

Today is the 80th anniversary of the surrender of Nazi Germany, taking effect at 01:01 Moscow Time. Out of all participants in WW2 Soviet Union took the heaviest losses in the war and made by far the biggest military contribution towards defeating Nazi Germany and the Nazi ideology. Lest we forget.
